Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the period of imposition of an additional sales and compensating use tax in Fulton county
Summary: Extends the period of imposition of an additional sales and compensating use tax in Fulton county.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the imposition of an additional sales and compensating use tax in Fulton county
